title: Coast to Coast Radio Program! Commercial Free! Feb 5th thru Feb
description:
Hello everyone. Here are the next eight broadcasts of C2C for you all to enjoy! Download, SEED, and Enjoy as always. Thank you all in advance for continuing to download, seed, and share these torrents. I hope it still continues to bring you knowledge and information. Keep up the good work and I will see you all next week as always! Stokeman Out....

Thursday February 5th, 2009
Life in the Galaxy
During the first three hours, astronomer Alan Boss discussed how mankind is at a turning point in its quest for discovering extraterrestrial life. There are 100 billion stars in our galaxy, and it's now believed that most of these have planets, many... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Alan Boss, Joshua P. Warren

Friday February 6th, 2009
2012 & Human Evolution
In the first half of the program, researcher and lecturer David Wilcock spoke about the year 2012, and presented scientific data which shows big changes are in store for humanity in the near future. According to Wilcock, crop circles have been pointing... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Open Lines, David Wilcock

Saturday February 7th, 2009
Soil & Civilization
Geomorphologist David Montgomery spoke about "the living skin of the Earth that is the foundation for all life on the continents" -- soil. We tend to take soil for granted, he said, but we can actually run out of it. Soil exhaustion brought about the... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): David R. Montgomery, James Lileks

Sunday February 8th, 2009
Mysterious Portals
During the second half of the show, author and playwright Patrice Chaplin revealed the story of the ancient, mystical city of Gerona, Spain and its connections to secret portals. She met Jose Tarres, the custodian of a private society, and learned that... 
Host: Ian Punnett
Guest(s): Patrice Chaplin, Kane Hodder

Monday February 9th, 2009
Prophecy, UFOs, & Shroud of Turin
Biblical prophecy researcher Joye Pugh offered her views of good vs. evil, end times, UFOs, cloning and the Shroud of Turin. She became interested in the subject of end times when she had an unforgettable dream at age six-- she saw a world of blackened... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Joye Pugh, Gary Ridenour

Tuesday February 10th, 2009
Prophecy, Nostradamus, & Obama
Prophecy scholar John Hogue discussed predictions for 2009, the future of the economy, the Obama administration, al-Qaeda threats, and the works of Nostradamus. In looking at the economy, we have to redefine depressionÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ what we're experiencing is...
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): John Hogue, Michael Shedlock

Wednesday February 11th, 2009
Luciferian Codes
Researcher and filmmaker Ken Klein discussed hidden Luciferian codes which he's deciphered primarily from the Book of Revelation. He explained that he has the ability to glean and interpret knowledge from the spiritual dimension. Lucifer, at one time,... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Ken Klein, John DeSalvo

Thursday February 12th, 2009
UFO Wars
Appearing during the middle half of the show, UFO researcher Ed Grimsley spoke about his observations of spacecraft, some of which appear to be conducting wars. As a teen in 1961, he said he first saw UFOs firing at each other in the night skies, while... 
Host: George Noory
Guest(s): Ed Grimsley
